column6: I was scared to death I was losing my mind
column8: I couldnt close my eyes I was pacing all night
column9: I think I found the light out the end of the tunnel
column10: I couldnt find the truth I was going under
column14: I gotta get out,, gotta get out,, gotta get out
column16: Lonely inside and light the fuse
column17: Light it now,, light it now,, light it now
column20: And now I will start living today,, today,, today
column22: I got this new beginning and I will fly
column26: Ill fly,, Ill fly,, Ill fly like a cannonball

column32: I was in the dark and then it hit me
column33: I chose suffering and pain in the falling rain
column34: I know,, I gotta get out into the world again
